 0 means next 14 structure members DO NOT contain valid data (SymbolRate, Frequency, Polarity, Band, Power, Long_Line_Comp, Hi_VoltageMode, Viterbi_Rate, SignalStrength, SignalLock, DataLock, LNBFault, VBER, Uncorrectables)

Detailed Description

The status structure for an S75 Version 5.x device (PesMaker).

Pass a pointer to one of these to getStatus() to have it filled in for you.

DSP Firmware version.

The MAC address of the receiver (Ethernet MAC).

BYTE PesMaker_Status::RFStatusValid

0 means next 14 structure members DO NOT contain valid data (SymbolRate, Frequency, Polarity, Band, Power, Long_Line_Comp, Hi_VoltageMode, Viterbi_Rate, SignalStrength, SignalLock, DataLock, LNBFault, VBER, Uncorrectables)

0 = vertical or right, 1 = horizontal or left

0 = low, 1 = high

BYTE PesMaker_Status::Power

0 = power to LNB is off, 1 = power to LNB is on

Long Line Compensation for losses in coax. 0 = off, 1 = on.

High Voltage Option, 0 = off, 1 = on.

BYTE PesMaker_Status::Uncorrectables

Number of uncorrectable DVB packets received since last status packet.

S75D_PIDList PesMaker_Status::PIDList

The PID List. Note that this list does not contain PID forwarding information. Use the function getPIDList() to get forwarding information.

Reserved field for future extentions.
